name: Northern Ireland Meat Exporters Association
goal:
NIMEA is a processor-led organisation representing private red meat processors producing beef and lamb for UK, EU and global markets.

NIMEA relies on strong partnerships with farmers and stakeholders along the supply chain to promote industry.
We also work with the government to ensure a strong understanding of the red meat sector and its importance to the economy.

Our key areas of focus are:

1.Representing the industry with respect to Brexit and its implementation.

2.Promoting the nutritional and health benefits of red meat.

3.Developing the commitment of the sector to environmental, economic and societal sustainability.
interests: Agriculture and Rural Development, Borders and Security, Business and Industry, Climate Action, Economy, finance and the euro, Taxation, Trade
euInitiatives:
Agricultural Policy
Trade Policy - particularly with respect to Brexit
Climate / Environmental Policy
